section.title: Stack Collection
section.para: The Stack class represents a last-in-first-out (LIFO) stack of objects. It implements classes IteratorAggregate and Countable and provides the following operations : the usual push and pop, a method to peek at the top item on the stack, a method to test for whether the stack is empty, a method to search the stack for an item and discover how far it is from the top, a method to clear the stack and also a method to transform the Stack into an array.
